Intervention: A 12-week online support group led by a health professional
A 12-week online support in a peer-led format
Eligibility: Inclusion Criteria: Clinical Diagnosis of Breast Cancer
• Access to the Internet; Ability to read and write English
Have completed breast cancer treatment in the past 36 months or have received treatment
Do not currently belong to an online or face-to-face support group for cancer
More than 36 months ago, we received treatment for breast cancer.
Unable to read and write English
Results: Results of the Personal Resources Questionnaire 85.

· The Personal Resources Questionnaire 85 (PRQ85), Part II, measures perceived social support and consists of 25 elements in a seven-point Likert format that are rated seven (7) strongly agree, to one (1) strongly disagree. Scores range from 25 to 175 with higher scores indicating higher levels of perceived social support.
A 12-week online support group led by a health professional
Unit of measurement: scores on a scale 50.22 (3.23)
Description of the arm/group: 12-week online support in a peer-led format
Unit of measure: scores on a scale 53.44 (3.08)
